examples.translation: 所有的居民都被可怕的疾病夺去了生命。
examples.last: population was wiped out by the terrible disease.

examples.translation: 整本书的内容只用一片硅芯片就可以装下。
examples.last: content of a book will be located on a single silicon chip.

adj: constituting the full quantity or extent; complete
constituting the undiminished entirety; lacking nothing essential especially not damaged
(of leaves or petals) having a smooth edge; not broken up into teeth or lobes
全部的,完整的，同性质的，纯正的，全面的
